movies.title: 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea
movies.plot: Captain Nemo goes even deeper into insanity in this mesmerizing fantasy tale. Once again at the helm of his fearsome, wildly advanced vessel, the nautical madman endeavors to turn the world above the waves upside down.
movies.simplePlot: Captain Nemo goes even deeper into insanity in this mesmerizing fantasy tale. Once again at the helm of his fearsome, wildly advanced vessel, the nautical madman endeavors to turn the world above the waves upside down.

biography.bio: Lorenzo Fernando Lamas was born in Santa Monica, California, the son of actors Arlene Dahl and Fernando Lamas. His father was Argentinian and his mother was American, of Norwegian descent. Lorenzo was raised in Pacific Palisades, California. In 1968, his family moved to New York. He attended private school, graduating from Admiral Farragut Academy in 1975. He then moved back to California. With encouragement from his father, he enrolled in Tony Barr's Film Actors Workshop and began his career with a small role in a television show in 1976. He also began to study karate and tae kwon do in 1979. He has starred in five television series and in over fifty movies. He is most known for his roles on television, notably as Lance Cumson on CBS' Falcon Crest (1981) and Reno Raines in the syndicated hit show Renegade (1992). Lorenzo also sustained a professional racing career while working successfully as a TV and Film actor in the 80's and 90's. He acts on stage and has a cabaret show that he tours with across the country. Some of the roles he has played onstage include the king in the musical The King and I as well as Zach in the musical A Chorus Line. He is an avid motorcyclist for over thirty years and has participated in the Love Ride, to benefit MDA and various charities since its inception in 1983. He is also on the board of directors. Lorenzo is a commercial helicopter and airplane pilot and he often flies disadvantaged children to summer camps and people too sick or financially challenged to travel normally on domestic flights. He just recently received his certification to become a helicopter flight instructor. In 2009, Lorenzo met his wife Shawna Craig who he asked to marry just three short months later. They are still happily married.
biography.name: Lorenzo Lamas

biography.bio: Sean Lawlor was born on January 25, 1954 in Dublin, Ireland. He was an actor, known for Braveheart (1995), Au nom du père (1993) and 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007). He died on October 10, 2009 in Dublin.
biography.name: Sean Lawlor

biography.bio: Natalie Stone was born on November 17, 1976 in London, England as Natalie Dina Abraham. She is an actress, known for 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007), Allan Quatermain and the Temple of Skulls (2008) and The Crypt (2014).
biography.name: Natalie Stone

biography.bio: Kim Little was born in Stillwater, Oklahoma, USA. She is an actress and writer, known for Jane White Is Sick & Twisted (2002), Killers (1997) and Killers 2: The Beast (2002). She has been married to David Michael Latt since October 8, 1994.
biography.name: Kim Little

biography.bio: Victor J. Springer is an actor and director, known for 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007), A Man's Worth (2008) and Charlie (2012).
biography.name: Victor J. Springer

biography.bio: Emilio Roso was born on August 22, 1976. He is an actor and producer, known for Joshua Tree (2011), Day of Redemption (2013) and Tumbleweed: A True Story (2014).
biography.name: Emilio Roso

biography.bio: Michael Tower is an actor, known for 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007), In the Key of Eli (2011) and Transmorphers (2007).
biography.name: Michael Tower

biography.bio: Damien Puckler was born on April 10, 1972. He is an actor and producer, known for Grimm (2011), Let's Roll: The Story of Flight 93 (2002) and Death Factory (2014).
biography.name: Damien Puckler

biography.bio: Declan Joyce was born on October 14, 1970 in Cleveland, Ohio, USA as Declan Edmund Leo Joyce. He is an actor and producer, known for Cops and Robbers, American Idiots (2013) and Not Another Not Another Movie (2011).
biography.name: Declan Joyce

biography.bio: Rob Filson is known for his work on AVH: Alien vs. Hunter (2007), Night of the Templar (2013) and 2012 Doomsday (2008).
biography.name: Rob Filson

biography.bio: John Tessier is an actor, known for 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007).
biography.name: John Tessier

biography.bio: Kenn Jenkins is known for his work on Vampires (1998), Paddington (2014) and 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007).
biography.name: Kenn Jenkins

biography.bio: Spencer Jones is an actor, known for Storming the Castle (2014), Effigy (2013) and 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007).
biography.name: Spencer Jones

biography.bio: Dorothy Drury is an actress, known for Street Racer (2008), 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007) and 2012: Supernova (2009).
biography.name: Dorothy Drury

biography.bio: Dan Halladay is an actor, known for 30,000 Leagues Under the Sea (2007).
biography.name: Dan Halladay
